resources.string: Unlock your tablet by looking at it

"Remember:
"
"Face matching is less secure than a pattern, PIN or password
"
Someone who looks like you could unlock your tablet"
"
The data used to recognise your face is kept private on your tablet

" "
"Find a place indoors that's not too bright or too dim
"
Hold the tablet at eye level
To unlock your tablet, just turn your screen on and look at the camera
Your tablet will unlock as soon as it recognises you

"Examples:
"
"In different lighting
"
With or without prescription glasses"
"
Bearded or clean-shaven"
"" Hold the tablet at eye level"
